name: portworx-data-science-engine
description:
**DSEngine is only available as an add-on to a base subscription to Enterprise DC/OS. Access to DSEngine is subject to additional fees. Please contact your D2iQ Account Executive should you wish to see a demonstration of DSEngine or to acquire access to DSEngine.**  

Portworx Data Science Engine provisions Jupyter Notebooks, an open-source web application that allows you to create and share documents that contain live code, equations, visualizations and narrative text.  
Uses include: data cleaning and transformation, numerical simulation, statistical modeling, data visualization, machine learning, and much more.
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 1 agent node with: 1 CPU | 4096 MB MEM.

Portworx should be installed on the Private Agents to be able to provision volumes.

Advanced Installation options notes:

storage / persistence: create Portworx volume for storing files to survive across restarts or failures. 

storage / portworx_volume_size: define the size of your Portworx persistent volume, e.g. 10GB.
postInstallNotes:
Portworx Data Science Engine is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/data-science-engine/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/
postUninstallNotes:
Portworx Data Science Engine has been uninstalled and will no longer run. 
Note: Data is persisted in Portworx volumes and can be reused later. If the data is not needed, delete the Portworx volume explicitly.
